email.subject: Tenure track position in software engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology in Karlskrona, Sweden

position.title: ASSOCIATE SENIOR LECTURER (TENURE TRACK)
position.description: Blekinge Institute of Technology is an internationally top-ranked research environment in empirical software engineering. Our campus is located at the shore of the Baltic Sea in the Southeast of Sweden. We offer study programmes in software engineering from undergraduate to postgraduate levels.

responsibilities: participate in leading and developing the department's research and educational activities
apply for external research funding, nationally and internationally
employment_details.research_focus: using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes as well as the quality of software artefacts (e.g., code or designs)
required_experience: tool development for the collection and analysis of software development data
empirical research in close collaboration with industry or government agencies

activities: course development at undergraduate and graduate levels
supervision of degree and project work at undergraduate and graduate levels
opportunity for the supervision of doctoral students

employment_details.resources: resources to finance one doctoral student

strategic_research_area.name: IT and mobile communication
strategic_research_area.expectation: contribute to ELLIIT's broader goals in research, postgraduate education, collaboration, and dissemination

criteria: completed a doctoral degree or has equivalent scientific competence

criteria.preferred_timing: no more than five years prior to the application deadline
